snippet: A simple workaround allows iPhone owners to download paid content inside some apps without paying. No hacking is required. A Russian software developer demonstrated the method in a YouTube video this week.
abstract: A simple workaround allows iPhone owners to download paid content inside some apps without paying. No hacking is required. A Russian software developer demonstrated the method in a YouTube video this week.

headline.main: Trick Gives iPhone Owners Free Access to Paid Content Inside Apps
